column1: Oradea has a warm-summer humid continental climate (Köppen climate classification Dfb) with oceanic influences. The city's topoclimatic action is determined by the prevailing Western winds.
Annual average temperature is 10.4 °C (50.7 °F). In July the average is about 21 °C (70 °F)

column4: with a maximum in June and a minimum in the late Autumn and Winter months of the year.
